mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of property owned or controlled by the Charlottesville Land Co., Charlottesville, Va. Nov. 29th, 1890 / R.E. Shaw, Engr
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map ; 39 x 66 cm. on sheet 44 x 71 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Descriptive text which follows the title is set in type, and includes information about lot sizes and street widths. "Shaw Del." does not appear on the map. [original]
"For full information, apply to John M. White, Secretary, Charlottesville, Va. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Has been altered in pencil to show the site of a "Proposed lake - July, 1911." Mounted on linen. Purchase. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Has been altered in pencil to show the site of a "Proposed lake - July, 1911." Mounted on linen. Purchase. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Charlottesville Land Company (Charlottesville, Va.)
